### About Me

Hi! Nice to meet you! My name is Yijia Jiang, born and raised in Suzhou, China. I am a 2rd year Master of Science student majoring in **Biostatistics** (Pharmaceutical Statistics Track) in the Mailman School of Public Health of <a style="text-decoration:none" href="https://www.columbia.edu/"> Columbia University in the City of New York</a>. I earned my Bachelor of Science degree in **Bioinformatics** in <a style="text-decoration:none" href="https://www.xjtlu.edu.cn/en/"> Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University</a>. Having broad interests, I am highly-motivated and reliable with pleasant attitude and perseverant personality. After graduation, I would like to serve human health and work as a statistical programmer, health data scientist or biostatistician in pharmaceutical and healthcare industry. Learn more from <a style="text-decoration:none" href="experience.html"> here</a>.
